content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "beehive", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "melon_slice", "quantity": 52, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 19}, {"type": "red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 18, "index": 21}, {"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 4, "index": 22}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 33, "index": 30}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 62, "index": 31}, {"type": "red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 54, "index": 42}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 18, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a stripped_spruce_wood, I need to place a stripped_spruce_log in the crafting table. The first stripped_spruce_log is in slot 19, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 2 with quantity 1
